subject: Hello
body:
Hello 
I have given you a clue, if you are indicating the purpose of sending, Indicate relative, to avoid bank asking you too many questions, also to avoid IRS and other financial network raise and eye brown for the large wire, we bankers have a method of applying such large wire.
keep posted once you make the payment.
Anthony.

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Anthony,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm a bit confused about the clue you mentioned. Could you please provide more information about what you're referring to? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Also, could you explain further about the method bankers use for applying large wire transfers? I'm not familiar with this process, so any additional details would be helpful.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Bennie

subject: Your urgent respond is needed.
body:
Hello Bennie:

You are advised to send Your full  name your home address,Your telephone number and any of your valid I D card for the process.But no respond from you why are you delaying?
Regards
Collins James

subject: Re: Your urgent respond is needed.
body:
Hello Collins James,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message, but I have a few concerns about providing my personal information. Can you please explain why you need my full name, home telephone number, and valid card? I want to make sure that any information I share is necessary and secure.

Best wishes,
Bennie

subject: Look forward to hear from you soon.
body:
Hello Bennie:
Yes your information is needed for the processing of the fund to your custody so it is necessary to know whom is receiving the fund OK.So kindly forward you details as per  your full name, home address, telephone number, and valid card . thank you 

Regards Collins James,

subject: Re: Look forward to hear from you soon.
body:
Hello Collins James,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to assist with the processing of the fund. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Could you tell me more about the fund and how it came about?
2. What is the purpose of needing my full name, home address, telephone number, and valid card?
3. Are there any fees or charges associated with this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Bennie
